page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT
page.content: THIS IS AN AREA OF HIGH UNEMPLOYMENT. THIS IS DUE MAINLY TO A RELIANCE ON 'HEAVY' INDUSTRIES,SUCH AS SHIPBUILDING,WHICH HAVE DECLINED IN RECENT YEARS. PEOPLE IN THE AREA DO A VARIETY OF JOBS. A LARGE PERCENTAGE OF THOSE EMPLOYED WORK IN THE ELECTRONICS INDUSTRY AND RELATED JOBS. THE BIGGEST EMPLOYER IN THIS FIELD IS IBM,WHICH HAS BEEN IN GREENOCK FOR 30 YEARS. THE NUMBERS EMPLOYED IN SHIPBUILDING AND HEAVY ENGINEERING IS RAPIDLY DECREASING. JOB PROSPECTS FOR SCHOOL LEAVERS ARE BLEAK. A YOUTH TRAINING SCHEME HAS BEEN SET UP BY THE GOVERNMENT TO TRAIN YOUNG PEOPLE FOR SPECIFIC JOBS.
